eMag.title: PHP Developer
bullets: Updated existing applications on older Symfony framework to newer versions (from Sf 3 to Sf 4, Sf 4 to Sf 5)
Implemented different functionalities in applications and services
Created and updated documentation for new and old applications and services

Ubisoft.title: QA Tester
bullets: Creating test plans and test cases.
Performing tests against builds and test procedures.
Designing and implementing automated test suites in Codeception.
Identify, analyze, and document issues resulted from running the automated test scripts.
Run tests, analyze results and report bugs found by the tests.

Electronic Arts.title: QA Test
bullets: Tested on 3 platforms that were available on the moment and gained knowledge about testing methodologies related to each one. (PC, PS3, Xbox360)
Improved team skills and communication by being part of teams that tested features requiring a large number of testers (Battlefield 3 â€“ 64 players on PC, 32 on PS3 and Xbox 360).
